items.prompt: A solution contains 25 mg drug per 5 mL. How many mg are in 12 mL?
items.hints: Find mg/mL, then multiply by 12 mL.

items.prompt: A dropper delivers 20 drops/mL. How many drops are in 2.5 mL?
An elixir has 8 mg per teaspoonful (5 mL). How many mg in 1 tablespoonful?
An inhaler contains 18 mg drug and delivers 200 actuations. How many micrograms per actuation?
A syrup contains 120 mg per 10 mL. If a patient takes 7.5 mL, how many mg are taken?
Convert 0.45 L to mL.
Convert 7500 mg to g.
A solution labeled 25 mg/mL: How many mL are needed for 180 mg?
Medication provides 150 mcg per spray; 120-spray canister. Total mg of drug?
items.hints: Convert mcg→mg after multiplying by sprays.

items.prompt: Balance SR=5 mg. If 100 mg is weighed, max % error?
You need 12 mg of a potent drug. Balance SR=6 mg, max error 5%. Outline an aliquot plan with lactose as diluent.
answerText: Prepare at least 120 mg mixture so a measurable aliquot contains 12 mg; e.g., 12 mg drug + 108 mg lactose to make 120 mg mixture; weigh entire 120 mg aliquot.
items.solution: Min weighable=(6×100)/5=120 mg. Make a 120 mg mixture with 12 mg active + 108 mg lactose. Weigh 120 mg aliquot to deliver 12 mg drug.

items.prompt: Interpret: 1 tbsp p.o. q6h
answerText: Take 1 tablespoonful by mouth every 6 hours
items.solution: Take 1 tablespoonful by mouth every 6 hours.

items.prompt: Interpret: Admin. prochlorperazine 10 mg IM q3h p.r.n. N&V
answerText: Administer 10 mg intramuscularly every 3 hours as needed for nausea and vomiting
items.solution: Administer 10 mg intramuscularly every 3 hours as needed for nausea and vomiting.

items.prompt: What volume (mL) do 75 g of castor oil (SG 0.96) occupy?
A lotion requires 2.5% w/w propylene glycol in 2.0 kg. SG PG=1.04. How many mL PG?
Interpret: ii gtt o.u. q.i.d.
answerText: Instill 2 drops in both eyes four times daily
items.solution: Instill 2 drops in both eyes four times daily.

items.prompt: A 5 mL ampule contains 100 mg drug. How many mg in 2.2 mL?
Convert 2 gallons to liters (1 gal=3.785 L).
A cream batch is 12 kg; contains 0.75% w/w fragrance (SG 0.90). How many mL fragrance?
Latin → English: gtt i o.u. q2h p.r.n.
answerText: instill 1 drop in both eyes every 2 hours as needed
place 1 drop in both eyes every 2 hours as needed
items.hints: gtt i = 1 drop; o.u. = both eyes; q2h = every 2 hours.
items.solution: Instill 1 drop in both eyes every 2 hours as needed.

items.prompt: A 250‑mL bottle labeled 80 mg/5 mL: total mg?
items.hints: Find mg/mL then multiply by 250 mL.
